issue.title: [Plasma] Clean up macro usage
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2541](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2541). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There are still a lot of macros being used as constants in the plasma codebase. This should be cleaned up and replaced with constexpr (deprecating them where appropriate).
